name: Brutal Strike
effects: you can forgo advantage on one Strength-based attack roll on your turn (must not have disadvantage)
if the chosen attack hits, it deals an extra 1d10 damage of the same type as the weapon or Unarmed Strike
choose one Brutal Strike effect: Forceful Blow or Hamstring Blow
limits: Forceful Blow: the target is pushed 15 feet straight away; you may move up to half your Speed straight toward it without provoking opportunity attacks
Hamstring Blow: the target's Speed is reduced by 15 feet until the start of your next turn; only one Hamstring Blow affects a target at a time
